summary: A narrator tells the story of his childhood years in a tightly knit Afro-American community in the deep south under racial segregation.
cast: Al Freeman Jr.|Phylicia Rashad|Leon|Paula Kelly|Salli Richardson-Whitfield|Anna Maria Horsford|Bernie Casey|Isaac Hayes|Ray J|Karen Malina White|Damon Hines|Iona Morris|Phill Lewis|Taj Mahal|Polly Bergen|Richard Roundtree|Braxton Brown III|Frank Hoyt Taylor|Montrel Johnson|Deionyos Llerena|Ben Epps|Tyrone Hicks|Charles Earl Taylor Jr.|Winston Hemingway|Sean Bridgers|Edward Allen|Don Tilley|George Hasenstaab|Deji LaRay|Angelo Pope|Brandon Crawford|Daphne Reid|Ralph Wilcox|Beatrice Bush|David MacIntyre|Tyhm Kennedy|Darren Beatty|David S. Lomax|Carter Gaston|Stan Kelly|Ashanti Nailah Blaize|Mark Britt|Rick Warner|Darren Law|David Lenthall|Ken Sprunt|Sherita Starks|Crystal Fox|Joe Inscoe|Nate Bynum|Wayne Dehart|Schree Tina Lewis|Bobby Graham|Jay Ellis|Tom Eubanks|Neil Ross
title: Once Upon a Time... When We Were Colored
